languages.text: "В опасное дело Ваша Светлость пытается втянуть старую Риззу. Бросьте вы это, мне слишком дорога моя шкура".
"Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship is trying to drag old Ryzza into dangerous business. Give it up. I'm much too fond of my own skin."
languages.original_text: "В опасное дело Ваша Светлость пытается втянуть старую Риззу. Бросьте вы это, мне слишком дорога моя шкура".

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship is trying to drag old Ryzza into dangerous business. Give it up. I'm much too fond of my own skin."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: “你这是打算把老莱萨拖到危险的行当里，大人。还是算了吧，我还挺珍惜我这条命的。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship is trying to drag old Ryzza into dangerous business. Give it up. I'm much too fond of my own skin."

traits.locale_text: “你这是打算把老莱萨拖到危险的行当里，大人。还是算了吧，我还挺珍惜我这条命的。”
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: 「陛下は老いぼれリザを、危ない事に巻き込もうとしていますね。諦めてください。我が身体が一番可愛いんです」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship is trying to drag old Ryzza into dangerous business. Give it up. I'm much too fond of my own skin."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下は老いぼれリザを、危ない事に巻き込もうとしていますね。諦めてください。我が身体が一番可愛いんです」
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, está intentando arrastrar a la vieja Ryzza al peligro. Déjelo. Le tengo demasiado aprecio a mi cabeza».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship is trying to drag old Ryzza into dangerous business. Give it up. I'm much too fond of my own skin."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, está intentando arrastrar a la vieja Ryzza al peligro. Déjelo. Le tengo demasiado aprecio a mi cabeza».
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft versucht, die alte Ryzza in gefährliche Geschäfte zu verwickeln. Gebt es auf. Mir ist meine Haut viel zu lieb."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship is trying to drag old Ryzza into dangerous business. Give it up. I'm much too fond of my own skin."

traits.locale_text: "Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft versucht, die alte Ryzza in gefährliche Geschäfte zu verwickeln. Gebt es auf. Mir ist meine Haut viel zu lieb."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: « Vous essayez de me mêler à des histoires bien dangereuses. Oubliez-moi, je tiens trop à ma peau. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship is trying to drag old Ryzza into dangerous business. Give it up. I'm much too fond of my own skin."

traits.locale_text: « Vous essayez de me mêler à des histoires bien dangereuses. Oubliez-moi, je tiens trop à ma peau. »
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, Koca Ryzza'yı tehlikeli işler yapmaya itiyor. Olmaz. Kendimi sandığından çok seviyorum."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship is trying to drag old Ryzza into dangerous business. Give it up. I'm much too fond of my own skin."
